sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export class About extends React.Component { render() { return(
about me
With a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Baylor University, I've journeyed through the exciting landscapes of software development, product management, and data-driven decision-making. I thrive at the intersection of technology, entrepreneurship, and human connection, where innovation meets collaboration. My passion lies in crafting solutions that address technical challenges and resonate with users on a personal level.

In my career, I've worn many hatsâ€”whether diving deep into code, strategizing product roadmaps, or engaging with stakeholders, I've learned to navigate both technical and business realms seamlessly. I believe the best products emerge when the voice of the customer is at the heart of every decision. This customer-centric approach has been my guiding principle, driving me to seek insights and feedback to inform my work.

I'm an advocate of thorough research and analytical approaches, leveraging these tools to make informed decisions and propel projects forward. My goal is always to create offerings that not only meet market needs but also exceed expectations. Building strong connections and fostering collaboration are my secret weapons in driving successful outcomes. Let's connect and explore how I can contribute to your organization.

sic 'em bears!
); } }
